meta.title: Panelyt - Panel Builder
meta.description: Optimize blood test panel costs using current prices and 30-day minimums.
meta.templateDetailDescription: View tests and pricing for the {name} panel.
meta.accountDescription: Connect Telegram to receive price drop notifications.
meta.sharedListDescription: View tests and live pricing for the shared panel {name}.

auth.usernameHint: 3-64 characters: lowercase letters, digits, hyphen, underscore.
auth.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters.
auth.usernameTooLong: Username must be 64 characters or fewer.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
auth.passwordTooLong: Password must be 128 characters or fewer.
auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to sync saved panels and notifications.
auth.registerDescription: Pick a username and password to secure your selections and future alerts.

home.comparePrices: We compare prices across tests and packages
home.saveDisabledEmpty: Add tests to save this panel.
home.shareDisabledEmpty: Add tests to share this panel.
home.templateDisabledEmpty: Add tests to save a panel.
home.searchTip: Tip: press <key>Enter</key> to add the top match instantly.
home.enterHint: Select a suggestion to add it.
home.noMatches: No direct matches yet. Try typing the test name.
home.emptyBiomarkers: Add tests to compare prices across single tests and bundles. We'll highlight packages that introduce bonus coverage along the way.
home.clearAllDescription: This will remove every test from your panel.

selection.alreadySelected: All tests from {name} are already selected.
selection.addedFrom: Added {count, plural, one {# test} other {# tests}} from {name}.
selection.cleared: Cleared {count, plural, one {# test} other {# tests}}.

results.emptyState: Start by adding tests above. Panelyt will run the solver instantly and suggest the cheapest combination of single tests and packages, highlighting any bonus tests you pick up along the way.

lists.title: My Panels
lists.description: Manage every saved test set, load it into the builder, or clean up old entries.
lists.noLists: No panels yet. Build a selection on the home page and press <saveButton>Save</saveButton> to store it here.
lists.shareDescription: Generate a shareable link to let others view this panel without editing rights.
lists.deleteDescription: This will permanently remove the panel and its saved tests.
lists.linkTelegramFirst: Link your Telegram chat in <link>Account settings</link> before enabling alerts.

saveList.title: Save current selection
saveList.description: Give this set a name so you can reload it or compare prices later.

collections.title: Curated Panels
collections.description: Start with science-backed test bundles. Load a panel into the builder or inspect the details before running price comparisons.
collections.failedToLoad: Failed to load panels. Please try again.

templateDetail.notFound: We couldn't find that test panel. It may have been unpublished.
templateDetail.pricingDescription: The builder runs automatically against diag.pl prices. Adjust the panel in the main app to explore alternatives.

optimization.noPackagesSelected: No packages selected in the optimal cart.
optimization.noSinglesSelected: No single tests selected in the optimal cart.
optimization.coverageGapsSummary: {count, plural, one {# test cannot be covered right now} other {# tests cannot be covered right now}}
optimization.biomarkersForPrice: {count, plural, one {# test} other {# tests}} for +{price}
optimization.addsBiomarkers: Adds {count, plural, one {# test} other {# tests}}
optimization.addonPillTooltipCovered: This test already exists in your order.
optimization.addonPillTooltipAdds: This test will be added to your order.
optimization.addonPillTooltipRemoves: This test will be removed from your order.
optimization.extraBiomarkersIncluded: {count, plural, one {# extra test} other {# extra tests}} included
optimization.optimizationSummaryDescription: Covering {count, plural, one {# test} other {# tests}} with the most cost-efficient mix available right now. Compare the optimized total against the sum of individual tests to understand potential savings.
optimization.bonusBiomarkersSummary: {count, plural, one {# bonus test} other {# bonus tests}} ({total})
optimization.packageOverlapsCollapsed: Click to see tests in multiple packages

sharedList.notFound: Unable to find this shared panel.
sharedList.invalidLink: This share link is no longer valid or has been revoked by its owner.
sharedList.livePricingDescription: Panelyt computes the cheapest cart for this shared panel using the latest diag.pl prices.

account.title: Account Settings
account.description: Link your Telegram chat to receive alerts when any saved panel gets cheaper.
account.signInRequired: Sign in to manage Telegram alerts and saved panels.
account.telegramUnavailable: Telegram integration is currently unavailable. Try again later.
account.telegramDescription: Start the bot in Telegram, then either tap the deep-link button or send the command shown below. You can also paste the chat ID manually if the bot replies with it.
account.sendCommand: Send <command></command> to the bot or tap below.
account.generateTokenHint: Generate a token to link a new chat or refresh the connection.
account.pasteChatId: Paste chat ID to link manually
account.step1: Tap the bot link or search for your Panelyt bot in Telegram and press <start>Start</start>.
account.step2: The bot replies with your chat ID and the <link>/link</link> command.
account.step3: Either use the command or paste the chat ID above to connect your account.
account.step4: Enable alerts on any saved panel from the Panels page. We will ping you when the price drops.

templateModal.modalDescription: Panels appear on the public collections page. Provide a clear slug and description so others understand the intent.

errors.failedToLoad: Failed to load. Please try again.
errors.clipboardUnavailable: Clipboard is unavailable. Copy the token manually.
errors.failedToCalculateTotals: Failed to calculate totals for saved panels.
errors.listNeedsBiomarkers: Add tests before saving a panel.
errors.templateNeedsBiomarkers: Add tests before saving a panel.

seo.homeOgDescription: Find the cheapest blood test combination. Compare prices across tests and packages to save money.

officeBanner.title: Choose your office for accurate prices
officeBanner.description: Prices and availability vary by location. Select your office to personalize results.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Panelyt is an open-source tool that helps you find the cheapest blood test combinations. We respect your privacy and collect only what's necessary to provide the service.
privacy.analyticsText: We use Umami, a privacy-focused analytics tool. Umami does not use cookies, does not collect personal data, and does not track you across websites. We only see aggregated, anonymous statistics like page views and country of origin.
privacy.accountDataText: If you create an account, we store your username and a securely hashed password. We never store your password in plain text.
privacy.savedListsText: Your saved test panels are stored on our servers so you can access them from any device. You can delete your panels at any time.
privacy.telegramText: If you link your Telegram account, we store your chat ID to send you price drop notifications. You can disconnect at any time from your account settings.
privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. If you delete your account, all associated data is permanently removed.
privacy.thirdPartiesText: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal data with third parties. Price data is fetched from diag.pl's public catalog.
privacy.contactText: Questions about this policy? Email us at <email>contact@panelyt.com</email>.
privacy.yourRightsText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights.
